name: Captain Curve's Intergalactic Space Adventure
description:
Even intergalactic space captains daydream! Avoid obstacles as Captain Curve explores space, land and sea.
The Imagination Fuel is burning down and Cap’s got places to be. Let your mind wander and collect additional fuel from daydream mini-games.Key Features / How to play
  • Infinite runner style main game.
  • Avoid obstacles – They’ll cause you to burn more fuel.
  • Collect the magic stars for Imagination Fuel
  • Experience 5 different minigames
